title: Regulation (EEC) No 3112/74 of the Council of 2 December 1974 implementing Decisions No 2/74 and No 3/74 of the Joint Committee set up under the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Swiss Confederation on the application of the rules on Community transit
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 3112/74 OF THE COUNCIL  of 2 December 1974  implementing Decisions No 2/74 and No 3/74 of the joint committee set up under the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Swiss Confederation on the application of the rules on Community transit
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Decisions No 2/74 and No 3/74 of the joint committee set up under the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Swiss Confederation on the application of the rules on Community transit, annexed to this Regulation shall apply in the Community as from 1 January 1975.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 December 1974.
For the Council
The President
J. SAUVAGNARGUES  (1)OJ No L 365, 31.12.1973, p. 226.
